product_name: Levi's Commuter Series Hooded Trucker Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Levi's Commuter Series Hooded Trucker Jacket blends right in with the urban environment of an everyday bike commute. Its ride-friendly features keep you comfortable on and off the bike. Stretch denim fabric comfortably moves with you, whether you're riding or hanging out at your favorite spot. Water-resistant and dirt-repellent Schoeller NanoSphere(R) protective finish helps fend off light rain, mud and road grit. Thin, roll-away hood with brim resists moisture and fits smoothly under a helmet to retain heat during chilly rides. 2 rear pockets across lower back have flaps to help keep contents secure. 2 hand pockets; 2 button-flap chest pockets; left-side chest pocket with an earphone port for your media player. Extended tail and sleeves offer good coverage when you're riding; back vent encourages airflow. Odor-resistant finish. Levi's Commuter Series Hooded Trucker Jacket has a regular fit and a hem that hits just below the hip; 27.25 in. back length. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Levi's Commuter Series Hooded Trucker Jacket blends right in with the urban environment of an everyday bike commute. Its ride-friendly features keep you comfortable on and off the bike.
